attributes.action: reopen the Portishead-to-Bristol Temple Meads Railwayline to passengers
attributes.additional_details:
The Reopening of the Portishead Railway Line has never been more necessary than now. After recent developments Portishead, a commuter town, has a vastly expanding population, but only one exit to the nearby city of bristol, which is the ever-gridlocked Portbury-hundred. It's Only 3 miles of railway left!

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portishead_Railway
http://www.portisheadrailwaygroup.org/
